summary.span: 提供 中 項目的資訊。

span.span: Provides information about the elements within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目是唯一允許的子元素。 elements are the only allowable child elements of a . 順序內的項目定義頁面順序。The order of the elements within the defines the page order. 提供下列相關資訊內的項目而不需要應用程式載入個別頁面。 provides information about the elements within a without the requiring the application to load individual pages. 相依性屬性會指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]相對應的。The dependency property specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the corresponding . 如需詳細資訊項目，請參閱第 3 章 XPS *Open XML Paper Specification*下載[XPS： 規格，並授權下載](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *Open XML Paper Specification* available for download at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下列範例示範新增的程序至。The following example shows the process of adding to a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 以非同步方式載入及剖析與此相關聯的資料流。 asynchronously loads and parses the data stream associated with this . 其他執行緒會繼續執行而完成。Other threads will continue to run while completes. 下列步驟說明如何載入內容以非同步的方式：The following steps illustrate how to load the content asynchronously: 1. 建立委派，並將它新增至通知事件。Create a delegate and add it to be notified of events. 2. 呼叫 。Call . 3. 當就會發生事件和呼叫委派時，內容完成載入。When the event occurs and the delegate is called, the content has completed loading. 載入項目透過傳回。The loaded element is returned through the . 屬性。property. 如需詳細資訊``項目，請參閱第 3 章 XPS 規格可以在取得的[XPS： 規格，並授權下載](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `` element, see chapter 3 of the XPS specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
